sql.query: INSERT INTO plugin_settings (plugin_name, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type, context_id) SELECT 'googlescholarplugin', 'enabled', '1', 'bool', p.press_id FROM presses p WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT ps.plugin_name FROM plugin_settings ps WHERE ps.plugin_name = 'googlescholarplugin' AND ps.context_id = p.press_id)

INSERT INTO plugin_settings (plugin_name, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type, context_id) SELECT 'dublincoremetaplugin', 'enabled', '1', 'bool', p.press_id FROM presses p WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT ps.plugin_name FROM plugin_settings ps WHERE ps.plugin_name = 'dublincoremetaplugin' AND ps.context_id = p.press_id)
UPDATE versions SET product_type='plugins.generic' WHERE product_type='plugins.viewableFiles'
UPDATE press_settings SET setting_name = 'citationsEnabledSubmission' WHERE setting_name = 'referencesEnabledSubmission'
UPDATE press_settings SET setting_name = 'citationsEnabledWorkflow' WHERE setting_name = 'referencesEnabledWorkflow'
UPDATE press_settings SET setting_name = 'citationsRequired' WHERE setting_name = 'referencesRequired'
